content: Scaling is all wrong on this version. Use a Galaxy A50 and the scaling is all wrong. In the past, best was clearly on the screen when I scrolled down. Now it's as it the app thinks the screen is 2 or 3 times its actual size. I have to scroll back and forth to see all the search results and get to the next page. I'll update ranking when fixed, but for now, this is what it's worth.

This use to be a good app until all the recent updates and so called new look...!!! Now I have large random black and white pixels across the screen, just under the Amazon Logo...!!! Plus the fact it doesn't search what I want, it's very random!!! Why doesn't the filter stay on until I've finished and not go back ever time I select one filter, very frustrating and annoying...!!!!

Please bring back the ability to sort people's wishlists from low to high price! It is not available on the app now and is very frustrating. I'd also love the search criteria to be more accurate. As someone mentioned below, the search results are often filled with items which vaguely relate to the search, making it harder to locate the item you are looking for.

App works almost as well as the desktop version, but the Search engine sucks on both, more so in the app. At least on the desktop version I can select multiple filters at once, whereas the app kicks you back to the list of results after each filter, even when you want to specify a sub-category. And it still shows tons of items completely unrelated to any of the words searched. AND FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS HOLY, LET ME SEE ONLY ITEMS SHIPPED FROM USA unless I decide I'm willing to wait.

For the last couple of months whenever I'm trying to look at the photos of products, by swiping to the left, the app freezes up and I can't even exit sometimes.. Locks up my whole phone. Eventually it will say Amazon shopping has stopped. Idk if I should in install and reinstall or what. But it's super annoying Also, and I am not rating the app lower for this until I've done my research, but I have been getting notified in the last month or so that Amazon was detected running in the background,.

Infuriating sometimes, fine otherwise. Mostly the app works fine but it just freezes when I try to write a product review or upload pictures for the review. I've had this problem quite frequently. This is so inconvenient that I have to upload the photos one by one and the app freezes before I can finish uploading all the images and then I have to kill the app and start all over again from scratch. Wish Amazon fixes this problem asap.

I have had no end of trouble with the app because it has become increasingly difficult to use. It took two months to place an order, because I found the site was not helpful. I completed the order, after much frustration. I tried to order a Bluetooth USB adapter and, when I placed it in the shopping basket, it loaded more items I hadn't ordered, but gave me the option of deleting one item, but the item it chose, was my actual order. The last straw was allowing me to add the item to basket, b

I've struggled with this app for years and it's barely functional. The new features for Smile and hearts to add to the wish list are great. Unfortunately absolutely everything else simply doesn't work. The add to wish list function hadn't worked for years and the searches are impossibly slow. But the straw that broke this reviewer's back is that the add to cart button no longer works, making the app useless for shopping. This is a plea to Amazon to fix this app!

Do not expect me to use this app for Whole Foods shopping unless: 1) I can reorder the list of past purchases to show the most recently delivered items first (as in the Prime Now app); 2) navigation to & from the Whole Foods shopping cart is direct & simple; i don't want to end up in Amazon shopping cart; 3) navigation is quick. I don't shop for groceries in an app the same way I shop for other items that are purchased less often. I do not want to spend more of my time shopping & looking!

This app is great. I love Amazon! If you need it, they have it. And I'm a Prime member which means I get free 2 day shipping, free movies and videos as well as music, etc. Highly recommended. Update: The app has drastically changed and its terrible. Practically unusable. Can't stand it. Cut way down on my Amazon ordering because of it. Return to the old app design and I'll return your stars.

I used to be able to click on links to Amazon products and have the app automatically pop up. Now the app freezes every single time that happens. I have to cut and paste a link, figure out what the product is, and then go search for it on the Amazon app that I have to open separately. What's the point of having an app that you can't trigger remotely?

In the 90s, when you loaded a picture you could see the progress in the strips as they loaded. Amazon has perfected 90s technology. Now you can wait for 4 hours to load a simple picture of an item and only see a swirling circle. This app used to be great. With the new update, search results are listed as pages rather than a list. This adds a whole new level of tedium to searching for things, having to constantly hit the next page button and trying to remember previous pages to compare items.

I miss the old version of the app. I loved the drag and drop feature for the items being put into a list at the bottom.. The search bar, I noticed, sucks too. The update overall, isn't it sis. My shopping on Amazon has decreased alot since.. I primarily use the app since it's easier, but the update for the Amazon app really changes the experience in a negative way..

My biggest complaint with Amazon app is the review section. Most Amazon users are all about checking out the reviews and pictures. It's REALLY frustrating when there are options to order from and you can't see which, color or product they ordered and wrote their review on because they don't mention which one. Or you go to the other list view and it won't show the pictures that goes with the review. When flipping through the photos, should be able to see everything instead of trying to guess.

Keep on getting a notification my order is a certain number of stops away, only to click on the notification and go into the app to see that it's not even out for delivery?!! Harder to search for deals, layout was better in the older version - this one somehow isn't as mobile friendly but I suppose it does what you want from it. Not more convenient or time saving than going through the website on an internet browser on my phone though.

I shouldn't have to turn on useless and annoying notifications for my purchases to count towards AmazonSmile donations!! Please fix this!! Also, the "back" button should take me to the previous item viewed, not the search input screen! The app has gotten worse over time, but the website isn't much better since you can't REALLY sort items by price on either platform!

Great app! The interface is easy to use, items are good quality and shipping is amazing compared to other apps. I ordered some manga, it was my first order on Amazon and was expected 3 days after the day i ordered it. It came the next day in perfect condition and that was without amazon prime. Every other book i ordered since has came the very next day with most other items coming in a month (worst case scenario) or the next day (best case scenario). Definitely stick with amazon.

Lags a lot. Not bad in general, filtering and results mediocre. Lagging with clicking like or save to list slow and most times just not reaponsive. Not problems with other apps or speed otherwise. Will up stars if those issues worked out. Amazon in general has issues they need to work through with calling things prime and you assume 2 day delivery but may be out of stock for weeks or months. My 3 stars don't reflect that issues. Otherwise would be lower.

The app has never let me into the site. It gives me a verification page which sends a text to my phone, it authorizes when I click on the link, then send me down the same path when I go in the app again. I have never gotten past the circle of authentication yet. Useless, but yet I can't uninstall. (It came on the phone as a unremovable app.)

For most part GREAT! But when you look at an item and it says to follow that brand it only shows you that item. Like that item is the only thing you're following not the brand. Just found that out today. But overall it's a good app. It's the most popular app to buy things on without going to each brands store. I do wish they would Not allow products from China. Had a lot being sold falsely and couldn't return. Amazon sided with seller even after proof was shown.

Searching for items has become impossible now. The images are enlarged so much that you can only see about 1/4 of the picture of the item. It's like it's not optimized for mobile devices and you are looking at the desktop version with no option to zoom in or out. This makes browsing for any item near impossible. Fix it and I will update my review.

I keep searching for a new update because the last one causes so many freezing issues. Any time I try to use this app it works ok for a few moments then freezes and is completely unresponsive. Trying to get even 3 items to buy takes longer than running down to the local Wal-Mart and back! You'd like with the current situation the devs would make sure their app that so many people are relying on would work perfect. Sadly I've noticed Amazon in general has gone down hill since the pandemic.

This app USE TO WORK. Whatever updates they've done over the past 6-12 months have made this app one of the least user friendly apps ever. It's slow. Constantly gives blank pages. Gives "uh-oh" pages. Takes forever to load, the aesthetics are worse than before...it is so frustrating. This app used to be a good, intuitive, user friendly app. Now? It's easier to use the mobile website than the app, which is just ridiculous.

Usually the app works fine, not as detailed as the website but great for quick purchases and browsing for your wishlist. But a week ago the thing just crashed and it wouldnt reopen. I reset my phone cleared out the app cache and all but it just wouldnt work. I'm reinstalling it now but that experience was a real let-down in terms of the app's quality. Other than that, it bugged out of payment in checkout a couple of times, but works well overall.

The app used to work perfectly fine, but since July, nothing but the home page loads 99% of the time. I either get errors or pages will only partially load and are completely unusable. It once straight up lied saying there was a problem with one of my orders. I switched to PC and then it didn't say anything was wrong, and I did receive the order. Why aren't you fixing this?

Improve: Useful for sure, however there is far too many menus you have to go through to get to eg. a product you ordered. Each page is slow, and you must go back one by one just as slow... That loading integrate: Amazon should share all orders, past ratings and profile with each store domain too!? I actually can't believe I have to go through settings, find where to and change my "country" just to check where a US order is, then swap back. No notifications for them either.

I know many states are still in lockdown mode, but something is going horribly wrong with deliveries, customer service, and the value of products. Clothing items are being sent to me in the wrong size & this was never a concern I had to deal with. I speculate that sellers are sending whatever they have to fulfill the "prime membership" I have with Amazon. In addition, sellers are falsely advertising items with false ratings & continue to keep business. It feels like a scam here now.

Poorly optimized, which is odd considering this was never a problem before. Runs incredibly slow, not talking like 30 seconds to load stuff but at times close to 5 minutes. Pissed me off enough to write a review about it. 2 stars because UI is tolerable, could be better, but nothing is as big of a deal breaker as the poor loading. It's an issue specific to this app too.

Terribly slow lately. Cannot browse. Cannot look at lists you have saved. Cannot look at previous orders. Nothing loads correctly. Pay monthly for prime membership but cannot even utilize the fast shipping because the app will not let anything load. Is there possibly a fix for this in the near future? Been like this for months now. Same problems. Done the tech support twice now, repeating steps both time to Uninstaller, reinstall, and try that. Still doesn't work. Still not my phone.

Absolute rubbish. The app keeps on crashing on my tablet after a few seconds. I will tell you what Jeff. I know you are finding it difficult to make ends meet what with the divorce and all that so I will lend you a few quid so that you can get a proper programmer to finish the app properly then you can pay me back when you are flush. I can't say fairer than that. 3rd August 2030. App has just updated. Still unusable. Constant crashes. Seamless shopping experience? I don't think so!

Usually very good but recently wishlists not working properly. Can't search by price drops anymore. And can't search by price high to low. (I used to have to as not all books from my wishlist would show searching by price low to high, then more would appear searching the other way around.) Can't do it now in the app-only on website on computer.

Overall, very good experience. BUT, the Filter feature is VERY Annoying! Why does the app need to refresh with every single change to the filter criteria? Why can user be not given the option to choose MULTIPLE / ALL criteria at once, and then only the app refreshes? (for reference, you may check Flipkart app) Please fix this. A similar annoyance existed with the absence of instant 'add to Wish List' feature, especially with the search results. This was fixed with the Heart icon feature.

I love Amazon. But wth did they do to it!? The screen is magnified 10x, I can't see anything at all bc one one single item takes up my whole screen. It's impossible to search for anything or view anything. I have never left a bad review on anything but what use is a shopping app if you can't view your search results!? Beyond frustrated.

Well done Amazon 5* for making a nice easy app for shopping a massive pain in the neck. Search feature now comes up with just about every other irrevelevant item and can only scoll through a few on each page now. Filters are also not that helpful to narrow down the pages of useless matches. Whoever you paid for this update ask for a refund, cause it needs fixing.

Amazon Prime has to be one of my favorite subscriptions and apps because of the fast shipping and delivery method. As well as the quality of customer service and quality of items. My family and I definitely rely on Amazon for most of our shopping needs since covid-19 pandemic started. I just wish sometimes that they had more options in items sold and a wider variety to display so my family and I could pick from new things rather than things we've already seen. However we are very woth amazon!!!!

For the most part, I like it, but I have a few issues. 1- I no longer see a way to sort the lists of other people. That is an extremely important feature for me, but I only have the option to sort things i look for, or my own lists. 2- The filter options have gotten terrible, and half the time I STILL get stuff that should have been filtered out. 3- I use Amazon Smile, and hate that I can only use it on my phone. If my husband orders something on his phone, it doesn't go through Smile.

Many glitches with the free version of the app for setting up playlists, including not being able to set pkaylist to shuffle, clicking on a song only to have the app play a completely different song, app loading songs into my playlist that I didn't request, and not being able to delete songs from playlist without encountering an error message. This clearly is not Amazon's core competency, and although free, it is so full of bugs I'm considering going back to another streaming app.

I've been having problems with the app since the last update. When on my lists trying to organize it by price (low to high) it won't change anything. It would do it before, but not anymore. Please fix it, that is great feature that will definitely make the decision on rather I go online or use your app. I appreciate your time reading this....

Thanks to their little update I am no longer interested in using this app. It was already a lot of trouble sorting through the less than useful inventory before they changed the filters tab. Now that the filters are harder to use this app takes to long. It is no longer effecient and I will never be able to find the things that I need without flipping through a million tabs. I guess they no longer want my business.

EDIT: still crashing, still having to unistall and reinstall... months layer comon Amazon, get this fixed... or I'm off! Normally love this app.... not anymore, it has become so slow, crashes all the time too. In the last week I have had to uninstall and reinstall at least 3 times because it just wont open. Please sort this out, it is just unworkable at the moment. Normally would be 4+ star rating, but not until issues are resolved.

Amazon. Name speaks for itself. Nobody can get my stuff to me as quick without having to shop at stores I would rather just wait for Amazon like everyone else. Quick shipping cheap prices and delivery + returns you really can't go wrong. More brands than I would like to see myself, sometimes when looking for a product I can get tied up with all the different brands that are new to me but I guess bigger product selection is what people want. Thanks Amazon for never disappointing.

It has always been wonderful, Amazon is my go to for online ordering. But I dont know what has happened recently bc all of the sudden it's super delayed and the pictures wont show up. it needs to be fixed ASAP! Not happy!! Is there no team reading these reviews?! Everyone is saying the same thing. This app used to be wonderful and now it barely works at all! Something needs to be fixed NOW. Currently it's basically useless üò°

Latest update unusable on Samsung Galaxy phone... Have to scroll reaaaallly far to right to see filters & some are missing or have no options in drop down. Used to work fine! Whyyy? Search results are giant, and can't see even 1 item w/ photo, description & price fully on screen at once. Do they think we are all on landscape tablets? Used to adjust to my screen size. Now like trying to shop on a website that wasn't designed for mobile. I mostly use on phone, or occasionally on tablet or laptop.

I have used this app for years and have loved it. But they have changed the layout. Instead of all the items for sale being right on top of each other, they added another row to the right. 2 items per line. I can't see both items unless I scroll over. And then I have to scroll down to see what's underneath. I don't know if I'm describing this well, but I find shopping with this really unpleasant. I guess I'll just use the website instead.

This app use to be great, now when I search for something I have to keep dragging the screen back & forth to see stuff. It automatically spreads it out like a freakin web browser & it's driving me nuts. I'm ready to uninstall, cancel my prime membership, and all of my Amazon music, etc. & stop buying from Amazon completely if this issue isn't fixed soon. **UPDATE** UPDATED MY ANDROID SYSTEM WEBVIEW & IT FIXED MY AMAZON APP PROBLEMS!

This is such a horribly buggy app verging on unusable. Horrible lag and it often makes my entire phone (OnePlus 7 Pro) unresponsive. I've had these same issues going back years and on several different devices. The problem clearly the app & its development team. It never improves and I'm tempted to say it has gotten worse. Today, I decided to remove the app and only access Amazon through Chrome. I wish I could tell you why I didn't decide to do this years ago. Amazon, get it together.

Fantastic Shopping App!! Amazon has almost everything a person could hope for!! The prices vary from very advantageous to ridiculously high. I believe they're high when Amazon doesn't want to carry that product. So that's when I shop elsewhere. Amazon usually exceeds my expectations! Whatever you buy can be returned with no hassle and Amazon pays the return shipping! I have several subscriptions for basic home products that I save a lot of money on plus I get a 5 or 15% discount on each of them!

Please FIX SAMSUNG DEX optomization! I use Samsung Dex for most of my computer needs does the job and I shop a lot on Amazon. The app isn't designed for the Dex OS, if you can get a developer to make it optomized for Dex users that be wonderful! Most the photo thumbnails are blow up and won't scroll though the menu photos when you are viewing an item. This doesn't give the feel of a good user experience! Thank you.

I loved Amazon & it has been my go-to online shop for years. Recently, lesser and lesser things have become available to ship to my country. Even when I select global shipping filters/ international shipping eligible, either no products are available or it shows me completely different products! There would be no point in me having Amazong much longer if this will continue to be the case for anything I buy. Hope things will change soon.

This latest Amazon update has completely ruined so much for me. Half the time my screen goes black when scrolling through a list and only returns after I've passed the item that causes the glitch. My Orders aren't showing up correctly causing me to order an item twice. It used to be 5 stars but the amount of bugs in this new update has been terrible

The new update on search is horrible. It used to be user friendly. Now the images are HUGE and I have to scroll back and forth to not only see the one image, but there is also another product to the far right of it that I'd miss if I didn't scroll over. The "Next" button is also to the far right. Can you please go back to the old list of smaller images of the products for easier viewing?

Overall I love Amazon, my only complaint with this app is that the filter options do not work anymore. I can select filters, but they never apply to my search. There's no apply button and when I toggle the filer box after selecting my filters nothing happens. The only button that works is the PRIME toggle button, not even the PRIME option in the filters, I've already reinstalled the app. A fix/update to correct this would really be nice and would create a better shopping experience.

My last two shopping experiences were pretty horrible! The previous time, I had to talk to customer service twice for 20+(?) minutes to get the free shipping I was led to expect, resulting in a store credit, not an immediate refund! The recent experience was so frustrating I was left hyperventilating for maybe 20 minutes, desperately trying to get my order accepted correctly by the app that was running me around and thwarting me! Even the order confirmation left me uncertain about my order!.

Great Amazon prime asap shipping, but the usual miserable experience trying to search for anything on Amazon. Can't believe they have still not fixed their awful UX. If I search for something specific, I do not want the billion things that are only VAGUELY related to a single keyword. Just add exact search quote function (ie "this and only this") PLEASE. (This literally makes me regularly shop elsewhere for higher price, just so I don't have to deal with that nightmare!)

Very disappointed. Can't buy coins for game apps. I get the runaround from customer service. I emailed 2 days ago for help and no email yet then did online help. That's when the runaround started. Cause of it I didn't get a chance to buy a very rare item in game that only comes out every 3 months if lucky. Couldn't even use my $15.00 gift card I won to add to the purple. How difficult is that. They see it. I'm only getting the $42.50 5000 coins package. üôÑ Very sad cause never had any problems

Can you PLEASE go back to the original layout?? This way zoomed in only seeing 1 product at a time thing and having to move my screen over left and right is wasting my time and I end up not buying anything because I can't see everything! If there's something I can do to fix it please let me know but it seems I'm not the only one experiencing this problem. It's SUPER annoying! 1 star til it gets fixed

It is a good app and I would give it a full 5 stars EXCEPT the back button is clunky where it stalls. The app has so many features that it is so easy to use and informative to keep track of past orders and coming purchases. It's just the back button which is a basic function. Just fix that and it is the perfect shopping app.

Caution - bait and switch shipping info! Pretty much all orders, you will find an item you want and Amazon will say "get it today by 6pm". Great, you think, but the app will default you to shipping out tomorrow when the order actually goes through. You must be vigilant. You must check and change the delivery options EACH time if you want to get that original delivery offering. So yeah, they can listen to your every word and give you customized ads, but can't get you the product on time.

I love the app. But right now with this update its making everything super zoomed in and I can't zoom out. Almost like its giving me the desktop version. I can't actually shop for anything because I have to scroll over a bunch just to see the full picture of the item. If this gets fixed or I figure out how to fix it the app would be 5 stars for sure.

The drop down menus in the search area don't work at all. When I search for something the results come up on a blown up page that is annoying as heck to look through the items because you have to scroll side to side and up and down. Everything was fine until the last update. Google has been more helpful than Amazon.

I regularly use amazon, have prime and generally have a good experience but WHY OH WHY have you now got search results in 2 columns with huge item images!! Now I can't conveniently scroll down through a list of results I have scroll to the side to see what I'm missing and because of the huge images I'm sure it displays less results per page! Bring back the convenient list with thumbnails!

Used to love it...but now it takes minutes to load and another minute to load the photos to scroll. Also when i hit next it opens up a thing to buy it. I used to order several things a week from the amazon app. I havent shopped in over a month because i waist ten minutes searching for one thing. Load the page. Open it...loooooaaaad...cant scroll the photos half the time and another min to load the reviews. Super annoying

The app has issues on Galaxy S10/Android. I haven't been able to select between shipping options. I have to open the internet browser to do so and complete the purchase... Amazon doesn't not provide a way to report bugs in its app. I don't have any special display setting enabled that could mess up with the app.

This app worked without issues for year, all the sudden I can't search or view products. Every time I try to view search results or a product I get an error page with message "Uh oh, something went wrong on our end." I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app multiple times. This is causing me to shop elsewhere.

Just like many other reviewers said its annoying to search for items. The pictures are far too big like a desktop version. Horrible experience on mobile. Items searched for also often come up with the wrong items. Pretty aggravating especially when there is tons of sponsored items that are nowhere near the items thats were searched for.

The "see more" button frequently does not work. I have been having an issue where I just can't tap on listings either. EDIT: had to cut everything else out due to charctr limit, but for some reason I can't select any sizes on anything I've previously bought. Called about it, was asked to try it on the comp and I'd get a $10 gift card and a call back in 30min. It's 9pm and I have recieved neither. Well, looks like if no one will fix my account prime is useless to me. Will be cancelling my sub

I have one question: why did they make it harder and harder to make wishlists? The tray was perfect, easily able to switch, updated and its gone. That was fine. They had the hearts, a little harder to switch lists, but fine. Whatever. Updated: Now, I can't *save* ANYTHING! The hearts are gone, trays are gone, wishist button won't even work. Stop. Making. Things. Harder.

Perfect except instant add to list. The update before this recent one allowed you to click a heart to instantly add an item to your default list and now the feature is gone again. Please bring it back. Thats the one thing that makes amazon on mobile worth it otherwise its just annoying to go all the way to the product page to add it to a list to then go back to the search page and find your place all over again.

Recurring issues with orders. Nothing arrives on time. The app tries to send me to UPS sites to find a package. No one knows where the package is or when it will be delivered. Contacting customer service to talk to a human is not easy. The chat always redirects to a different page on the app. All to avoid the real issue that they can't deliver on their 2-day shipping policy. So then what am I paying for a Prime account? LS:SS/ Amazon is useless middleman. Buy local. Save yourself the stress.

Amazon is slow compared to other sales apps. I forgot that Amazon does not take direct payment the last time i ordered from them and I got a payment revision needed email long after i placed my order with them and since i could not pay them the revision they had asked for i had to cancel the order. I am also waiting on a package that did not come when they said it would. All i got was a running late status and the sad part of this is that i cant track it.

Much better than wish! I used to shop exclusively at wish, then I ordered a few times here, and discovered most of the products are exceptional, but the deliveries are reliable, plus, most of the time the tracking is reliable! Like Amazon actually gives a damn about providing customer service to their customers, and not just taking advantage of them! Thank you Amazon! Now I shop exclusively on Amazon!

I've used this app for years. Recently, something has changed and it's so laggy it's unusable at times. Have tried reinstalling tna. Shame, I've been a heavy Amazon shopper since they only sold books. This is making me abandon quite a few shops now. Update: 10 Aug 20. The App seldom works without stopping. Have reinstalled. Now it just exits on startup. Shame as I use Amazon most days. ( Android 10.)

This app absolutely sucks on Android devices. I cannot search for anything. It crashes immediately upon searching for items basic functionality that is performed on the iPad cannot be performed on mynote 10 plus. It is obvious that I have all the current updates and bells and whistles, please fix this immediately.

For my first thing I bought I was told that it arrived at August 14, checked and it wasn't there. I checked for about a week and it never arrived, told an expert and they said that it was scanned wrong and it would arrive in 1-2 business days, checked in every day for around a week again, wasn't there. Talked with a expert again, and they just gave me a refund and considered it lost. For my first product on Amazon I had a terrible experience. The only good thing about that were the experts.

Amazon still has shipping delays but won't offer a discount on Prime memberships. If I pay for Prime I expect to get what I've paid for. Amazon isn't fulfilling this and won't give discounts. However, Amazon can afford to donate millions of dollars in the last month. Something isn't adding up here. The only reason I continue to keep my account is for the Prime movies/TV. I'll continue to support other businesses and stop ordering from Amazon.

I buy lots of stuff on Amazon. Shopping on Amazon is frustrating if not maddening about half the time, convenient the other half. My primary complaints:1) early on, prices were almost always fair, Today, prices are frequently obscenely higher.than at other retailers, 2) there is very little information about most items which leads to frequent disappointments, 3) explicit descriptions of what you want are redirected to unrelated items, 4) many products are junk, Amazon does not vet quality.

The application moves slower than dial-up and when you go through the application to try to get to customer service they make you wait longer than Verizon or AT&T to get to customer service. And then the people that do answer the customer service on chat they never read the previous messages and they always ask you the same question back you ask them!!

It's always insanely slow, and has been for over a year. Especially if i want to add an item to a list or select another color/size option. I use it, but I hate it. I've even uninstalled the app and re-installed it in case it was because the app was old on my phone, but that made it worse, and now it crashes and closes.

Every time I open the app it gives me a full screen nag to pay for prime with a big yellow "yes" button and a tiny little "oh maybe later button". This would be bad enough if I didn't already have household prime, so they're just trying to trick me into paying twice for something I already have. Nice try.

Baddest after sale service possible I got severals orders canceled without any explanations by emails or within the app. I order something with my workinf card no problem anywhere with it and it's keep canceling the orders whereas everything's fine with the payment as Amazon says. When trying to reach their service desk, it's impossible to have someone on call. The only wait is waiting for them to call you but you never receive the call and you don't even have a clock saying how long you wait.

I love this app, it's so easy to go down the rabbit hole here, so much to choose from.. The layout and navigation is awesome which makes it easy to search for a particular item. If you have a bad experience, they help to try to fix the issue. I didn't realize how many days had gone by and I hadn't received my product. Amazon sent me a message and drew my attention to it. Great app!

I tried to login on my phone but it wouldn't let me sign into my account until I confirmed the account belonged to me via email.
